name: ARIA (itch)
description:
An audio visual experience made for the Leap Motion 3D Jam 2014.

Note: The EnviroTestbed is an early prototype of the game environment. Interactions are limited to handling gems using the Leap Motion controller. Intended gameplay has not been implemented in this prototype.

Controls

A Leap Motion controller is required to interact with the environment. The controller should be placed in front of you, facing upward on your desktop.

Hold your hand over the Leap Motion controller to begin interacting with the environment. Use a pinch gesture with your thumb and forefinger to pick up floating crystals.

Tab Toggle VR mode Spacebar Reset the scene Esc Exit the application

This prototype offers VR support for the Oculus Rift, but is limited to DK1 and DK2 using legacy runtimes. This does not support Oculus CV1 or newer.
